des: "A guilt-free way to satisfy those chocolate cravings (which, in my case, are constant). I know the ingredients may seem a little weird, but I swear this tastes just like chocolate pudding! Feel free to make substitutions with more common ingredients (ie. regular milk for the soy or honey for the agave nectar)."
ins: Blend banana, avocado, soy milk, berries, cocoa powder, agave nectar, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.
